query.oql: select distinct title, count(partition) as n from authors A group by title: A.title
query.qrawl: select distinct A.title AS title, count(partition) as n from authors A group by A.title

query.oql: select distinct title, (select distinct year from partition) as years from authors A group by title: A.title
query.qrawl: select distinct A.title AS title, (select distinct a.year from a in partition) as years from authors A group by A.title

query.oql: select distinct year, (select distinct A from partition) as people from authors A group by title: A.year
query.qrawl: select distinct A.year as year, (select distinct A from partition A) as people from authors A group by A.year
